text: The 2019 Women’s European Boxing Championships was hosted and organized by the Spanish Boxing Federation in Pabellón Amaya Valdemoro, Alcobendas, Spain in 2019. The event was held from 24 to 31 August 2019. The tournament was organized in association with the European Boxing Confederation (EUBC). ==Medal winners== {| |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Flyweight (51 kg)Fly (51 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Featherweight (57 kg)Feather (57 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Lightweight (60 kg)Light (60 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Light welterweight (64 kg)Light Welter (64 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Welterweight (69 kg)Welter (69 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Middleweight (75 kg)Middle (75 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Light heavyweight (81 kg)Light Heavy (81 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2 align="center"|Heavyweight (+81 kg)Heavy (+81 kg) Draw Sheet |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==Medal table== == Participating nations == 136 boxers from 31 nations competed. * (3) * (9) * (6) * (3) * (4) * (2) * (6) * (1) * (8) * (1) * (9) * (4) * (8) * (1) * (2) * (1) * (1) * (2) * (2) * (8) * (7) * (10) * (1) * (5) * (2) * (6) * (2) * (3) * (8) * (10) * (1) ==References== Category:Women's European Amateur Boxing Championships Boxing Category:Sports competitions in Spain European Amateur Boxing Championships Category:2019 in the Community of Madrid Category:2019 in Spanish women's sport Boxing European Category:Alcobendas
title: 2019 Women's European Amateur Boxing Championships
